doc.field: Poe Collection: Letter, Edgar Allan Poe to Miss Lucy D. Henry, 1843 June 20
Poe Collection: Letter, Edgar Allan Poe to Miss Lucy D. Henry, 1843 June 20
Source copy consulted: Accession number 465C, Poe Museum, Richmond, Virginia
Source copy consulted: Accession number 465C, Poe Museum, Richmond, Virginia
Letter, Edgar Allan Poe to Miss Lucy Dorothea Henry, June 20, 1843 Poe Museum, Richmond, Virginia
It gives me pleasure to com- ply with the very flattering request cont- ained in your letter to my sister of March 26 th .
With the Highest Respect I am, Madam Yr Mo Ob St Edgar A. Poe Miss Lucy D Henry
Letter, Edgar Allan Poe to Miss Lucy Dorothea Henry, 1843 June 20
